title: TRAIL TRACKS
description: Where precision meets speed, steer your way to the end-line. Stay on track and you'll stay in the game. Wander off track and you'll have to walk out. Gather your courage and components! Are you up for this rip-roaring race where only the fast and furious finishes first?
rules: A maximum of 4 members per team is allowed.
Bots if found to be outsourced will be eliminated.
event guidelines: Track includes T-joints, dotted lines, acute, obtuse angles and some color changes in the line.
Bot should be operated on a battery source.
Duration allotted for each team is 5 minutes.
In case of any deviation from the path, the team should start from the last checkpoint and a maximum of 2 attempts will be provided for the same within the allotted time.
The bot should not be immobilized for more than 30 seconds.
This event is evaluated on a time basis.
ground rules: A team shall consist of a maximum of 4 members
Bots if found to outsourced will be eliminated
In case of any deviation from the path, the bot should start from the list checkpoint
A maximum of 2 attempts will be provided for each team
The bot should not be immobilized for more than 20 seconds
Bot should be operated on a battery source
technical specification: The permitted dimensions of the bot is 25cm*25cm*30cm.
Maximum frame size of the drone must be 270mm.
Battery capacity must not exceed 14.8v and 3,500mAh.
Carbon fiber and metal propellers are not allowed for safety concerns.
